title: Build landing page matching uploaded AI Image Generator design (mock generate + static gallery)

requirements.text: Create a responsive single-page website that closely replicates the layout, typography, and visual styling of the uploaded design image (grok_image_xg2a6g3.jpg), including: top navigation bar, hero section with large title, prompt input section with a Generate button, and a Gallery grid section.

quotes: Create website according to image I uploaded

acceptanceCriteria: Page structure matches the uploaded design at a high level (nav + hero + prompt/generate section + gallery).
Typography, spacing, and overall look-and-feel are visually consistent with the uploaded design (dark cinematic card, subtle glow, elegant headline).
Layout is responsive (mobile/tablet/desktop) with no horizontal overflow.

requirements.text: Implement the top navigation UI from the design with links: Home, Gallery, Pricing, Contact (and decorative icons if present), and provide smooth-scroll behavior to corresponding page sections.

quotes: Make whole website with this image all future's settings working

acceptanceCriteria: Clicking Home/Gallery/Pricing/Contact scrolls to the correct section.
Active/hover states are styled coherently with the overall theme.
On small screens, navigation remains usable (e.g., collapses into a menu or wraps cleanly).

requirements.text: Build the prompt input section ("Enter your description here...") with a text input and a mock/non-AI "Generate" button. When clicked, show a brief loading state and then add a new placeholder image card to the gallery using a pre-generated static asset (no external AI APIs).

quotes: I'll start building your website now based on the uploaded design, using static placeholder images and a non-functional Generate button.

acceptanceCriteria: Generate button does not call any external AI service.
Clicking Generate shows a visible loading state for ~0.5–1.5s and then updates the UI (e.g., adds a new gallery item).
If the prompt is empty, the UI prevents generation or displays a clear inline validation message.

requirements.text: Create a Gallery section that visually matches the design: a section title, an optional style/filter dropdown (e.g., "Dramatic"), and a grid of image cards with consistent aspect ratio, rounded corners, and hover/focus styling.

quotes: Make whole website with this image all future's settings working

acceptanceCriteria: Gallery displays at least 6 static placeholder images in a grid similar to the design.
Cards are keyboard-focusable and have accessible alt text.
Dropdown (if included) updates gallery ordering or filtering on the client side without backend calls.

requirements.text: Replace any photos of real people from the uploaded design with neutral, non-person placeholder imagery (e.g., abstract AI-themed art, futuristic textures, landscapes) while keeping the same layout composition.

quotes: will use static placeholder images and a non-functional (mock) "Generate" button.

acceptanceCriteria: No real-person photos from the uploaded image are reused in the site assets.
Hero and gallery imagery use neutral non-person visuals that preserve the intended composition.

requirements.text: Establish and apply a coherent visual theme consistent with the uploaded design: dark charcoal/black surfaces, deep crimson accents, subtle glow/highlight treatments, and elegant serif headline typography paired with a readable sans-serif for body text. Apply consistently across all sections.

quotes: Create website according to image I uploaded

acceptanceCriteria: Colors, gradients, and glow effects are consistent across nav/hero/prompt/gallery.
Headings use a consistent display type style; body text remains readable with sufficient contrast.
Buttons/inputs match the theme (rounded corners, subtle border/glow, consistent focus ring).

requirements.text: Add a simple Pricing section and Contact section (as linked from the nav) that match the site theme and provide complete, polished content placeholders in English.

quotes: Make whole website with this image all future's settings working

acceptanceCriteria: Pricing section contains at least 2–3 plan cards with names, prices, and bullet features (placeholder text is acceptable).
Contact section contains a styled contact form (name/email/message) that validates inputs client-side and shows a local success message on submit (no email integration).
Both sections are reachable via nav smooth-scroll and maintain consistent styling.

requirements.text: Add generated static image assets to the project under frontend/public/assets/generated and render them in the hero and gallery sections.

quotes: Use static placeholder images for the gallery/people photos instead of reusing exact images from the design.

acceptanceCriteria: All required generated images exist at frontend/public/assets/generated with the specified filenames.
Hero and gallery render these local assets directly (no backend image routing).
Site builds without broken image links.

constraints: Do not use any external AI image generation APIs; the Generate action must be mock/placeholder only.
Do not reuse real-person photos from the uploaded design; use neutral non-person placeholder imagery instead.
Do not edit files under frontend/src/components/ui or other immutable paths listed in SYSTEM_CONTEXT; compose them as-is if needed.
Backend must remain a single Motoko actor; do not introduce additional backend services.
nonGoals: User accounts beyond any default template/auth (no custom auth requirements requested).
Real payments processing for pricing plans.
